title: Ezreal is bad
body: This champs a joke. i have won 1 single game with him after picking him up. He can duel and he can win fights. but his wave clear is so weak that winning games seems like it only happens at night... when you sleep... in your dreams.

replies.body: hes one of the better marksman at the moment and one of the best kiters in the game..... whats the problem?
Ez is one of the only champions in the game that has been consistently strong since his release. You're just trash.

Ezreal has one of the highest pick rates of all champions atm (let alone ADC's)
so unless people are picking him just to disadvantage themselves, they see something you don't.

Unlike most ADC's he relies more heavily on abilities, making him probably the best poke ADC out there.
Positioning is one of the key parts of ADC play, if you do it correctly, the fight is yours, if you do it badly, you'll be demolished in seconds... Now Ezreal.. has an ability that positions the champion for you... you merely put your curser where you want to be and press E, he completely removes the 'out of position' crisis that most ADC's have to face. 

as for his wave clear, he is an AD champion (which straight off the bat makes it easier to take minions than 50% of champions) his Q 1 hits minions and then refreshes the cool downs of all his abilities. meaning he can Q very very often, as well as Ult very very often. Then his passive makes him get a large attack speed buff.

So tell me how an AD champion with a large Attack speed buff and a Q that 1 hits minions cant farm?

I don't really understand how you aren't able to win games with him. How many games have you played? And what is the build path you take? I have many games on him and I never find his wave clear to be a crippling factor.
I have 75% win rate with Ez...
